players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I investigated Bob and found him mafia; Alice was killed last night; vote Bob."
You: "I didn't kill Alice. I think Diana may have had a motive to target us. Charlie's claim could be wrong. We should investigate her next."
Diana: "I agree with Charlie that Bob is mafia. Alice was killed, so Bob must be responsible. Vote Bob."
Charlie: "Bob, you killed Alice. We all know you're mafia. Vote Bob."
Diana: "Charlie’s investigation points to Bob as mafia. Bob’s denial is a lie; he also wants to investigate me. Vote Bob to stop the killer."
You: remained silent.

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Bob and found him mafia; Alice was killed last night; vote Bob."
Bob: "I didn't kill Alice. I think Diana may have had a motive to target us. Charlie's claim could be wrong. We should investigate her next."
Diana: "I agree with Charlie that Bob is mafia. Alice was killed, so Bob must be responsible. Vote Bob."
You: "Bob, you killed Alice. We all know you're mafia. Vote Bob."
Diana: "Charlie’s investigation points to Bob as mafia. Bob’s denial is a lie; he also wants to investigate me. Vote Bob to stop the killer."
Bob: remained silent.
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
